price: Ati tukisha kufa na tukawa udongo na mifupa ndio kweli tutafufuliwa?
arabic: أَءِذَا مِتۡنَا وَكُنَّا تُرَابٗا وَعِظَٰمًا أَءِنَّا لَمَبۡعُوثُونَ
footnotes: Hivyo sisi tukisha kufa tukawa udongo na mafupa tutatolewa tena makaburini kwetu tuwe wahai?

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: a-idhā mit'nā wakunnā turāban waʿiẓāman a-innā lamabʿūthūna
